author: CopperfieldRscr
content: Disclosure: We bought $STMP on 7/19 and bought more today – Let us share a few opinions

author: CopperfieldRscr
content:
Smart guys are behind the short thesis. Antics aside, we respect their work.
Smart guys were also behind short thesis on NFLX, MNST, etc

author: CopperfieldRscr
content: Short thesis has thus far been factually invalidated as misleading/ever-changing arguments. We will focus on the message, not the messangers

author: CopperfieldRscr
content: Worth considering source on much of $STMP "expert" industry work. Perhaps an axe to grind: https://t.co/F5ScLr3aCY

author: CopperfieldRscr
content: Intuiship is not a shell company of $STMP as argument originally went; this is factually incorrect.  https://t.co/UXOY4LmvTb

author: CopperfieldRscr
content: Intuiship customers, like all resellers', require an account with a PC postage co to print labels. STMP/Endicia has become a quasi monopoly

author: CopperfieldRscr
content: Ecom mktplaces and resellers w/NSAs  are permitted/encouraged  to offer discounts to sub-50K package merchants (suggesting otherwise =wrong)

author: CopperfieldRscr
content: These discounts (below CB but only as low as CPP) are offered everywhere, Shippo, Ebay, Etsy, Easy Post, etc https://t.co/JAlgoIuTGJ

author: CopperfieldRscr
content: This is not “abuse” but a strategy the USPS endorses to garner mkt share from UPS/FDX across smaller single carrier (or multi) ecomm

author: CopperfieldRscr
content: If $STMP was abusing ecosystem vs value add, then they would have disproportionate % of ecosystem economics & take rate would increase.

author: CopperfieldRscr
content: THIS IS NOT THE CASE - in fact, contrary to short case, $STMP unit economics declined in Q2'16 to 6.2% from 6.4% (of $ postage printed)

author: CopperfieldRscr
content: the USPS is gaining mkt share, SS/SW (owned by $STMP) are most robust s/w solution – and of course use $STMP for back-end/printing to their

author: CopperfieldRscr
content: Multicarrier solutions have minuscule penetration rates & $STMP is cleaner & more robust API than USPS click n ship. What changes this?

author: CopperfieldRscr
content: On NSA’s - PRC approves and monitors all NSA and runs elasticity-based test

author: CopperfieldRscr
content:
NSAs must “improve the net financial position of the Postal Service” NET=key
NSAs must improve the operational efficiency of the USPS (yep)

author: CopperfieldRscr
content: Competitive NSAs must cover their attributable cost (reseller/PC Postage ecosystem splits not salient, $STMP gets more b/c massive value)

author: CopperfieldRscr
content: Competitive products as a whole must contribute 5.5 percent of Institutional costs, this too is easy to audit/track for individual NSA's

author: CopperfieldRscr
content: if believe reseller ecosystem serves its purpose and remains, then % to $STMP doesn't matter vs the holistic take rate.

author: CopperfieldRscr
content: W/O change, $STMP is dominant company in a secular growth industry with small penetration rates, w/ annualized tax effected FCF rr of $120M

author: CopperfieldRscr
content: Just bought back 2% of the company and authorized another 3% of the company with that FCF.

author: CopperfieldRscr
content: Aside from histrionics and arm waiving (HLF), $STMP partnership with USPS and unit economics are strengthening, =  long set-up, not short

author: CopperfieldRscr
content: Finally, only a moron would play for a short squeeze in a stock with S/I just 2 days to cover and GC borrow with 1M+ on feeds

author: CopperfieldRscr
content:
We’d like to think we aren’t morons, at least not intentionally
We’d also like to think we do reasonable work - https://t.co/ALRFlvW9UZ

author: CopperfieldRscr
content: We’d also like to think hubris and arrogance are the Achilles Heels of most investors; we may be wrong, and if so, we will sell w/ impunity.

author: CopperfieldRscr
content: @PresciencePoint finally, despite the harangues directed our way, PP does very good work. We just so happen to disagree on $STMP....
